emperors_new_clothes.desc: Overthrow Austria and become the Emperor of the Holy Roman Empire.
emperors_new_clothes.name: The Emperors new clothes

sailor_mon.desc: As Pegu, have at least 100,000 sailors.
sailor_mon.name: Sailor Mon

trade_hegemon.desc: Starting as any European country, conquer and have cores on Aden, Hormoz and Malacca.
trade_hegemon.name: Trade Hegemon

the_bohemians.desc: As Bohemia, own Dublin as a core province.
the_bohemians.name: The Bohemians

draculas_revenge.desc: Start as Wallachia or Moldavia, form Romania and own or have a subject own all of the Balkans.
draculas_revenge.name: Dracula's Revenge

world_conqueror.desc: Own or have a subject own the entire world.
world_conqueror.name: World Conqueror

fezzan_corridors.desc: As Fezzan, control at least 90% of the trade power in Tunis, Katsina, Safi and Timbuktu.
fezzan_corridors.name: The Fezzan Corridors

buddhists_strike_back.desc: As Ceylon, own all of India and convert it to Theravada Buddhism (do not form another nation).
buddhists_strike_back.name: The Buddhists Strike Back

back_to_the_piast.desc: As Mazovia or Silesia, form the nation of Poland.
back_to_the_piast.name: Back to the Piast

queen_of_mercury.desc: As Kilwa, own and have cores on Zanzibar and Bombay (North Konkan).
queen_of_mercury.name: Queen of Mercury

carthago_delenda_est.desc: As an Italian culture nation, make sure entire Tunis Area is at 100 devastation.
carthago_delenda_est.name: Carthago Delenda Est

the_continuation_of_diplomacy.desc: Successfully use Threaten War to gain a province from another nation.
the_continuation_of_diplomacy.name: The Continuation of Diplomacy

switzerlake.desc: Own 99 provinces as Switzerland while owning no ports.
switzerlake.name: Switzerlake

around_the_world_in_eighty_years.desc: Starting as a Custom Nation of up to 400 points in the British Region, own New York, San Francisco, Suez, Bombay, Calcutta, Hong Kong and Yokohama by 1524.11.11.
around_the_world_in_eighty_years.name: Around the World in 80 Years

luck_of_the_irish.desc: Own and have cores on the British Isles as an Irish nation.
luck_of_the_irish.name: Luck of the Irish

anglophile.desc: Complete all English and British missions.
anglophile.name: Anglophile

turning_the_tide.desc: Start as a Steppe Horde in 1444 and embrace all institutions.
turning_the_tide.name: Turning the Tide

liberty_or_death.desc: Start as USA in 1776 bookmark and own all your cores while being at peace.
liberty_or_death.name: Liberty or Death

philippine_tiger.name: Philippine Tiger
philippine_tiger.desc: As Cebu, recreate the Chola Empire.

master_of_india.desc: Own and have cores on all of India as a European nation.
master_of_india.name: Master of India

great_moravia.name: Great Moravia
great_moravia.desc: Restore the Great Moravian borders as Nitra or Moravia.

empire_of_mann.desc: As Mann, conquer all Islands in the world.
empire_of_mann.name: Empire of Mann

gentle_persuasion.desc: Have a Siege Specialist general win a siege in a province with a fort.
gentle_persuasion.name: Gentle Persuasion

blood_for_the_sky_god.desc: As a Tengri nation, have Nahuatl as your syncretic faith.
blood_for_the_sky_god.name: Blood for the Sky God!

one_faith.desc: Have all non-wasteland land provinces in the world be of your religion.
one_faith.name: One Faith

azur_seme_de_lis_or.desc: Get all the French Cores as France.
azur_seme_de_lis_or.name: Azur semé de lis or

consulate_of_the_sea.desc: As Aragon conquer all Mediterranean Centers of Trade.
consulate_of_the_sea.name: Consulate of the Sea

sun_invasion.name: Sun Invasion
sun_invasion.desc: As the Madyas, own and have cores on Tepeacac, Mexico, Tullucan and Huastec.

52_garhs.desc: As Garhwal own and maintain 52 forts without going into debt.
52_garhs.name: The 52 Garhs

first_come_first_serve.desc: Starting as a Western technology custom nation in North America or South America with no more than 200 points, unite the two continents.
first_come_first_serve.name: First Come, First Serve

strait_talk.desc: As Hormuz, have at least 10 diplomatic reputation
strait_talk.name: Strait Talk

sons_of_carthage.desc: As Tunisia, own and have cores on Sicily, Sardinia, the Balearic Islands, the coast of Algiers and the southern coast of Spain.
sons_of_carthage.name: Sons of Carthage

my_true_friend.desc: Go to war in support of a rebel faction and win, enforcing their demands.
my_true_friend.name: My True Friend

the_navigator.desc: As Portugal, get owned provinces in Africa, India and Indonesia before 1500.
the_navigator.name: The Navigator

baltic_crusader.desc: As Teutonic Order or Livonian Order, own all of Russia as core provinces and convert it to Catholic.
baltic_crusader.name: Baltic Crusader

chop_chop.desc: With only one Monarch, have six different Consorts.
chop_chop.name: Chop Chop

baa_baa_black_sheep.desc: As Qara Qoyunlu become the leading producer of wool.
baa_baa_black_sheep.name: Baa Baa Black Sheep

viva_la_revolucion.desc: Have rebels you support in another country enforce their demands.
viva_la_revolucion.name: Viva la Revolución!

dude_where_s_my_boat.desc: Capture 20 boats with the Boarding Naval Doctrine.
dude_where_s_my_boat.name: Dude, Where's my Boat?

from_humble_origins.desc: Starting as a custom nation with no more than 50 points, have at least 2000 total development.
from_humble_origins.name: From Humble Origins

neither_holy_nor_german.desc: Have 7 Free Cities in the Empire, none of which is of a Germanic culture.
neither_holy_nor_german.name: Neither Holy, Nor German

a_heros_welcome.desc: As Karaman, form the Sultanate of Rum.
a_heros_welcome.name: A Hero’s Welcome

disciples_of_enlightenment.desc: Starting as Dai Viet, have 10 nations follow the Mahayana Faith by 1500.
disciples_of_enlightenment.name: Disciples of Enlightenment

bunte_kuh.desc: As Hamburg, trade in both Gems and Livestock.
bunte_kuh.name: Bunte Kuh

kushite_restoration.desc: As a Nubian culture nation, own the entire Egyptian region as core provinces.
kushite_restoration.name: Kushite Restoration

the_third_way.desc: Start as an Ibadi nation and eliminate all rival schools of Islam (do not convert to another religion).
the_third_way.name: The Third Way

a_manchurian_candidate.desc: Start as one of the Jurchen tribes and form Qing.
a_manchurian_candidate.name: A Manchurian Candidate

sweden_is_not_overpowered.desc: Own and have cores on the entire Baltic coastline as Sweden.
sweden_is_not_overpowered.name: Sweden is not overpowered!

lion_of_the_north.desc: Start as Sweden and lead the Protestant League to victory against the Emperor.
lion_of_the_north.name: Lion of the North

hessian_mercenaries.desc: As Hesse, have at least 50 regiments of mercenaries and no loans.
hessian_mercenaries.name: Hessian Mercenaries

winged_hussars.desc: Have Winged Hussars as your active unit with more than +50% cavalry combat ability.
winged_hussars.name: Winged Hussars

a_sun_god.desc: Form Inca, embrace all Institutions and own all of South America as core provinces.
a_sun_god.name: A Sun God

imperio_espanol.name: Imperio español
imperio_espanol.desc: As Spain have Mexico, Panama, Havana, Cuzco in colonial Nations under you.

avar_khaganate.desc: Achieve Empire rank and conquer Hungary as Avaria.
avar_khaganate.name: Avar Khaganate

the_three_mountains.desc: Own or have a subject own the entire world as Ryukyu.
the_three_mountains.name: The Three Mountains

better_than_napoleon.desc: As France, own Vienna, Berlin and Moscow as core provinces.
better_than_napoleon.name: Better than Napoleon

pick_your_poison.name: Pick Your Poison
pick_your_poison.desc: As Kaffa, develop in Cafa while a subject of yours owns it.

home_and_away.name: Home and Away
home_and_away.desc: As Wales, hold Cardiff, Dublin, Edinburgh, Rome, Paris and London.

we_bled_for_this.desc: Win a war with at least one million dead on both sides.
we_bled_for_this.name: We bled for this

redecorating.name: Redecorating
redecorating.desc: Starting as an Orthodox Nation, Consecrate Metropolitan in Roma.

sunset_invasion.desc: Own and have cores on Lisbon, Madrid, Paris, London, Amsterdam and Rome as the Aztecs.
sunset_invasion.name: Sunset Invasion

turn_the_table.desc: As a colony, break free and vassalize your former overlord without forming any other nation.
turn_the_table.name: Turn the Table

subsidize_my_love.desc: Subsidize 3 different allies at least 50% of their monthly income without running a deficit.
subsidize_my_love.name: Subsidize my Love

a_tale_of_two_families.desc: Starting as Vijayanagar or Bahmanis conquer the other’s capital and have them not exist.
a_tale_of_two_families.name: A tale of two Families

norwegian_wood.desc: Own or have a subject own all naval supplies provinces as Norway.
norwegian_wood.name: Norwegian Wood

all_belongs_to_mother_russia.desc: Start as a country of Russian culture and form Russia.
all_belongs_to_mother_russia.name: All belongs to Mother Russia

banners_need_a_saga.desc: Have 100 regiments as Banners raised at the same time.
banners_need_a_saga.name: These Banners need a Saga

where_the_heart_is.desc: As Dahomey, force all non-Fetishist nations out of Niger and Sahel by 1500.
where_the_heart_is.name: Where the heart is

turkish_delight.desc: Start as Candar and own 20 Sugar provinces between you and your subjects.
turkish_delight.name: Turkish Delight

relentless_push_east.desc: Starting as a Russian nation, By 1600 own the East Siberian Coastline.
relentless_push_east.name: Relentless Push East

this_is_my_faith.desc: Convert to Protestantism and unlock 3 Aspects of Faith.
this_is_my_faith.name: This is My Faith

levant_turnabout.name: The Levant Turnabout
levant_turnabout.desc: As the Mamluks, have 100 Army Professionalism and annex the Ottomans.

cold_war.desc: Win a war without fighting a single battle.
cold_war.name: Cold War

traditional_player.desc: More than 90 percent Naval and Army Tradition.
traditional_player.name: Traditional Player

big_blue_blob.desc: As France, hold 100 European core provinces before 1500.
big_blue_blob.name: Big Blue Blob

protect_the_secret.name: Protect the Secret
protect_the_secret.desc: As Yemen, prevent any European Nation from owning a Coffee-producing province in the Old World until 1700.

pandya_empire.desc: Starting as Madurai, conquer the Pandya Territories.
pandya_empire.name: Pandya Empire

golden_horn.desc: As a Somali nation, fully own the Horn of Africa region and have a monthly gold income of at least 10 ducats.
golden_horn.name: Golden Horn

no_pirates_in_my_carribean.desc: Own or have a subject own the entire Caribbean.
no_pirates_in_my_carribean.name: No Pirates in my Caribbean

this_is_persia.desc: Form Persia and own Egypt, Anatolia and Greece as core provinces.

abu_bakr_IIs_ambition.desc: Start as Mali and have 4 Colonial Subjects in South America.
abu_bakr_IIs_ambition.name: Abu Bakr II’s Ambition

terra_mariana.name: Terra Mariana

total_control.desc: Own 100 or more provinces with no local autonomy or unrest.
total_control.name: Total Control

factionalism.desc: Have 3 different estates in your country with at least 70% influence each.
factionalism.name: Factionalism

marshy_march.desc: Have a march with at least two marsh provinces.
marshy_march.name: Marshy March

market_control.desc: Be trade leader of seven different goods.

center_of_attention.desc: Own both a Protestant and a Reformed Center of Reformation.
center_of_attention.name: Center of Attention

take_that_habsburgs.desc: As Hungary, own all of Austria as core provinces.

poland_can_into_space.desc: As Poland, reach the maximum level in all technologies (32).
poland_can_into_space.name: Poland can into space

african_power.desc: Own and have cores on all provinces in Africa as Kongo.
african_power.name: African Power

the_rising_sun.desc: Own and have cores on all of Japan as a European nation.

holy_trinity.desc: As the Papacy, own Jerusalem and have Livonian Order, Teutonic Order and The Knights as Marches.
holy_trinity.name: Holy Trinity

lessons_of_hemmingstedt.desc: As Dithmarschen, hold the provinces of Sjaelland and Holland while Denmark do not exist.

industrial_powerhouse.name: Industrial Powerhouse
industrial_powerhouse.desc: Have 10 furnaces built in your nation.

david_the_builder.desc: As Imereti, form Georgia and have no free building slots.
david_the_builder.name: David the Builder

just_resting_in_my_account.desc: Corrupt the officials in a Rival country.
just_resting_in_my_account.name: Just Resting In My Account

networking.desc: Have 100 point spy networks in 3 Rival nations.
networking.name: Networking

basileus.desc: As Byzantium, restore the Roman Empire.
basileus.name: Basileus

shahanshah.desc: Start as Tabarestan and form Persia.
shahanshah.name: Shahanshah

the_pen_is_mightier_than_the_sword.desc: Have three unions at the same time as Austria.

the_princess_is_in_this_castle.desc: As a country that does not start with a female heir, have a female heir while having a Castle in your capital (more advanced fort buildings do not count).
the_princess_is_in_this_castle.name: The Princess is in this Castle

grand_duchy.desc: Starting as a Duchy, have 1000 development without upgrading your government rank.

saladins_legacy.desc: Playing as Hisn Kayfa, reforge the Ayyubid Empire.
saladins_legacy.name: Saladins Legacy

sinaasappel.name: Sinaasappel!

bleed_them_dry.desc: Have 10 different War Reparations being paid to you at the same time.

komenoi_empire.desc: As Trebizond, have the Empire government rank.

king_of_jerusalem.desc: Form the Kingdom of Jerusalem as Cyprus or The Knights.

trustworthy.desc: Have five allies with 100 trust towards you each.

guaranteer_of_peace.desc: Guarantee the Independence of France, The Ottoman Empire and Russia.

meissner_porcelain.desc: As Saxony, own or have a subject own all Chinaware provinces in the world.

iron_price.desc: Restore the Danelaw region to Danish rule, and make it Danish culture.

hoarder.desc: As a Fetishist nation, have 13 available Cults.

no_trail_of_tears.desc: Own and have cores on the Thirteen Colonies as Cherokee with all institutions embraced.

good_king_rene.name: Good King Renee

respected.desc: Have 100 prestige, 100 legitimacy and three stability.

the_grand_armada.desc: Have 500 heavy ships and no loans.

lazarus.desc: As Serbia, own the entire Balkans as core provinces.

die_please_die.desc: Have a ruler with 1 or lower in all three categories who is over the age of 70.

prester_john.desc: Own and have cores on Alexandria, Antioch and Constantinople as Coptic Ethiopia.

fine_goosestep.desc: Form Prussia and have at least 125% Discipline.

barbarossa.desc: As a Maghrebi nation, have 500 light ships privateering at the same time.

white_elephant.desc: As Ayutthaya, own all of Indochina as core provinces.

gothic_invasion.desc: Start as Theodoro and conquer all Germanic culture provinces in Europe.

auld_alliance.desc: As Scotland, have France as a vassal (do not form Great Britain).

choson_one.desc: As Korea, own or have a subject own all Shinto, Confucian and Buddhist provinces in the world.

this_revolution_was_crushed.desc: In a war against the target of the Revolution, control their capital and have at least 99% war score.

voltaires_nightmare.desc: Have at least 75 countries in the HRE.
voltaires_nightmare.name: Voltaire's Nightmare

mare_nostrum.name: Mare Nostrum

raja_of_the_rajput_reich.desc: Conquer all of Germany as Nagaur.
raja_of_the_rajput_reich.name: Raja of the Rajput Reich

krabater.desc: Form the nation of Croatia and station a unit of cavalry in Stockholm.
krabater.name: Krabater

core_fu.desc: Force a nation to revoke 5 cores in one peace deal as Corfu.

queen_of_conquest.name: Queen of Conquest

cities_of_cibola.desc: As Pueblo, own at least seven provinces with 10 development each.

bengal_tiger.name: Bengal Tiger

great_perm.name: Great Perm

kirishitan_japan.name: Kirishitan Japan

venetian_sea.desc: Have a 75% Trade share in both the Alexandria and Constantinople nodes as Venice, owning less than 10 cities.

one_king_to_rule.name: One King to Rule!

arabian_coffee.desc: Form Arabia and be the nation producing the most coffee in the world.

mass_production.desc: Starting as Odoyev, own one of every manufactory.
mass_production.name: Mass Production

grand_army.name: That's a Grand Army

cowardly_tactics.desc: Have a fort and a supply depot in a mountainous province producing livestock.
cowardly_tactics.name: Cowardly Tactics

royal_authority.desc: Install an union through a succession war.

in_the_name_of_the_father.desc: As an Orthodox country, have 100 Patriarch Authority.

the_great_khan.desc: Starting as Mongolia or Great Horde, own or have a subject own the Chinese, Russian and Persian regions.

live_long_and_prosper.desc: Have 30 states with prosperity at the same time as you have a 70 year old ruler.
live_long_and_prosper.name: Live Long and Prosper

golden_empire.desc: Enact a Golden Age as an Empire.
golden_empire.name: A Golden Empire

even_better_than_piet_heyn.desc: Gain over 100 gold from privateering a single treasure fleet.
even_better_than_piet_heyn.name: Even Better than Piet Heyn

servitor_of_jagannath.desc: Start as Orissa and own or have a subject own all tropical wood provinces.
servitor_of_jagannath.name: Foremost Servitor of Jagannath

rags_and_riches.desc: Have the highest income in the world while owning no province with a development level higher than 10.
rags_and_riches.name: Rags and Riches

frozen_assets.desc: Start as Novgorod and control 90% of the trade power in the White Sea trade node while it is the highest valued trade node in the world.
frozen_assets.name: Frozen Assets

pyramid_of_skulls.desc: As a Steppe Horde, raze a province with at least 30 development.
pyramid_of_skulls.name: Pyramid of Skulls

the_white_company.desc: Join a war on the other side of someone to whom you have rented condottieri.
the_white_company.name: The White Company

laughingstock.desc: Own the provinces of Haha, Hehe and Lolland.
laughingstock.name: Laughingstock

sun_never_sets_on_the_indian_empire.name: The Sun Never Sets on the Indian Empire
sun_never_sets_on_the_indian_empire.desc: Form Hindustan or Bharat and own or have a subject own Cape, London, Hong Kong (Canton) and Ottawa (Kichesipi).

industrial_evolution.name: An Industrial Evolution
industrial_evolution.desc: As Great Britain, own all of England as core provinces and have at least 25 development in each province there.

its_all_greek_to_me.name: It's All Greek To Me
its_all_greek_to_me.desc: Form Greece and own and have cores on Zeta, Thatta, Lamba, and Roh.

for_odin.desc: Starting as a Norse custom nation with no more than 200 points and a maximum of 5 provinces, own & core Scandinavia and the British Isles and convert it all to Norse.
for_odin.name: For Odin!

its_all_about_luck.desc: Win a battle against a great leader, without a leader.
its_all_about_luck.name: It's all about luck

at_every_continent.desc: Own one province on each continent.
at_every_continent.name: At every continent

full_house.desc: Have 3 Vassals and 2 Marches at the same time.
full_house.name: Full House

on_the_edge_of_madness.desc: As Aztecs, reach 95 Doom, then go 20 years without Doom hitting 100.
on_the_edge_of_madness.name: On the Edge of Madness

four_for_trade.desc: Form four Trade Companies and get bonus merchants from all of them.
four_for_trade.name: Four For Trade

narcissism.desc: Name a general after yourself and lead your army to victory.
narcissism.name: Narcissism

graze_my_horse_here_and_here.desc: As a Horde, own over 200 provinces producing grain.
graze_my_horse_here_and_here.name: I'll graze my horse here.. And here…

not_so_sad_a_state.desc: As Portugal, have a colony in Brazil and in Africa.
not_so_sad_a_state.name: Not so sad a state...

double_the_love.desc: Start with no unions and get two at the same time.
double_the_love.name: Double the Love

the_re_reconquista.desc: As Granada, form Andalusia and reconquer all of Iberia.
the_re_reconquista.name: The Re-Reconquista

multiculturalism.desc: Have 4 different Cultures and 4 different religions represented in your court.
multiculturalism.name: Multiculturalism

one_family_to_rule_them_all.desc: Have your dynasty on 8 thrones at the same time. Client states do not count.
one_family_to_rule_them_all.name: One Family to Rule them All

time_bandit.desc: Successfully steal a map from another nation.
time_bandit.name: Time Bandit

dovmonts_own.desc: Starting as Pskov, have 100 standing Streltsy units.
dovmonts_own.name: Dovmont's Own

kow_tow.desc: As Ming, have a subject from each religion group.
kow_tow.name: Kow-Tow

grand_navy.desc: Build up your navy to your country's maximum navy forcelimit.
grand_navy.name: That's a Grand Navy

rekindling_the_flames.desc: Starting as a Zoroastrian custom nation with no more than 200 points and a maximum of 5 provinces, rekindle the royal fires.
rekindling_the_flames.name: Rekindling the Flames
